name: 千雪
text: （あぁ、ミュージカル楽しかった……♪）
trans: (Today's musical was really lovely♪)

name: 千雪
text:
（チケットをくれたお仕事先の人には
ちゃんとお礼をしなくちゃ……！）
trans:
(I should thank the client
who gave me the invitation…)

name: 千雪
text:
……あれ？
甘奈ちゃん？
trans:
Is that…
Amana?

name: 甘奈
text: あ、千雪さん！
trans: Oh, Chiyuki!

name: 千雪
text: 甘奈ちゃんも来てたのね？
trans: Amana, did you come here as well?

name: 甘奈
text:
うんっ
この前、チケットもらったから──
trans:
Yeah,
I got the invitation last time.

name: 甘奈
text:
って、それより！　千雪さんも来てるなら
連絡すればよかったぁ～っ
trans:
Setting that aside, 
I also should've asked if you were going here too.

name: 千雪
text:
そうね……
私も一緒に見たかったなぁ
trans:
Yes…
I wanted to see it together too.

name: 甘奈
text:
……あとあとっ！
千雪さん、その服……！
trans:
…And on top of that, 
Chiyuki, those clothes!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふ、この前一緒に選んでもらった服……
せっかくだから……着てきちゃった
trans:
Fufu, yes, the ones you two chose for me last time…
I thought this was the opportunity, so I wore it today.

name: 甘奈
text: えへへっ、やっぱりめっちゃ似合ってるよ～！
trans:
As i said last time, 
It looks really good on you!

name: 千雪
text:
ありがとう
甘奈ちゃんと甜花ちゃんが一生懸命選んでくれたおかげよ
trans:
Thank you. 
Thanks to you and Tenka for choosing this for me.

name: 千雪
text:
……あ、そうだ
甘奈ちゃん、このあと時間ある？
trans:
Ah, right!
Say Amana, do you still have time after this?

name: 甘奈
text: うん、大丈夫だよっ
trans: Yeah, sure!

name: 千雪
text:
この近くに、素敵なカフェがあるの
よかったら、一緒に行ってみない？
trans:
There's a nice cafe close by,
so why don't we go there together?

name: 甘奈
text:
えっ！？　行く行く！
千雪さんのおすすめ、気になるし！
trans: Really!? Of course! I'm curious what kind of place your recommendation would be!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、ありがとう
それじゃ、行きましょう♪
trans:
Fufu, thank you.
Well then, let's go♪

name: 甘奈
text:
うわぁ……！
すごい……！
trans:
Wow!
This is awesome!

name: 甘奈
text:
テーブルとか椅子とか、お料理も、雰囲気も……
もう、全っ部かわいー！　すごい！
trans:
The tables, chairs, the food, and the atmosphere…
Everything is super cute and awesome!

name: 千雪
text: 気に入ってくれた？
trans: Do you like it?

name: 甘奈
text:
うん、最高だよーっ！
はー……甜花ちゃんとも一緒に来たいな～……！
trans:
Yeah! It's really the best!
Ah… I want Tenka to come here along too!

name: 千雪
text:
……そうだ
今から、甜花ちゃんも呼んでみない？
trans:
…Oh,
why don't we call her then?

name: 甘奈
text: えっ、いいのっ？
trans: Eh, Is that fine?

name: 千雪
text: ええ、もちろん♪
trans: Yeah, of course♪

name: 甘奈
text:
やったぁ！
ちょっと電話してみるね！
trans:
Yeah!
Let's call her!

name: 千雪
text: うん、お願い
trans: Alright then, please.

name: 甘奈
text:
──あ、もしもし
甜花ちゃん？
trans:
Ah Hello,
Tenka?

name: 甘奈
text:
今、千雪さんと一緒にカフェに来てるんだけどね、
そのカフェがすっごいの！
trans:
I'm at a cafe with Chiyuki right now,
and the cafe is really amazing!

name: 甘奈
text:
お店もお料理も本当かわいくて……
もう、絵本から飛び出してきたんじゃないかってくらい！
trans:
The shops and the dishes are also really cute…
I guess it feels like you jumped out of a picture book!

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈、３人で一緒にここでお茶したくてっ
だからお願い……！
trans:
Us three could go together and
have some tea here!

name: 甘奈
text:
……それにね、甜花ちゃんっ
今日は特別なんだよ～！
trans:
And with that,
today is the special day!

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、詳しくは来てからのお楽しみっ
どうかな？
trans:
Ehehe, you'll find it out once you get here.
How about that?

name: 千雪
text: ふふっ……
trans: Fufu.

name: 甘奈
text:
えっ！
……来てくれる？　本当に？
trans:
Eh?
You'll come along? For real?

name: 甘奈
text:
やったぁ！　じゃあ近くに来たら迎えに行くね
場所は──
trans:
Awesome! Then, tell us when you're near,
so we could pick you up.

name: 千雪
text:
それじゃあ、甜花ちゃんが来るまで
ふたりでお茶してましょうか
trans:
And that so, we'll have some tea
until Tenka comes.

name: 甘奈
text:
うん！　甘奈、ずっとさっきの
ミュージカルの話がしたかったんだ～！
trans:
Yeah! I always wanted
to talk about the musical!

name: 千雪
text:
わぁっ
私も甘奈ちゃんの感想、聞きたいな
trans:
Oh,
I want to hear your impression about it.

name: 甘奈
text:
甘奈ね、
もうずっと感動しっぱなしだったんだけど──
trans: I was moved by it from the start to finsh―

name: 甘奈
text:
特に、ラストの『夢を叶えたふたりが
星空の下で愛を誓い合うシーン』が素敵で……
trans:
But that last scene… the one where the couple who fulfilled their dreams,
and promises love under the starry sky… That was really wonderful…

name: 甘奈
text:
ああいうの……
ほんっと、憧れちゃうなー☆
trans: Ah, I wish I would be in that kind of situation☆

name: 千雪
text:
うんうん、わかるなぁ
ラストシーン、とっても素敵よね……！
trans:
That's right, the last scene
was really quite wonderful!

name: 千雪
text:
あのミュージカルって
私の大好きな映画が元になってるんだけどね……
trans:
In fact, that the musical
is based on my favorite film…

name: 甘奈
text:
へぇ～
そうだったんだ！
trans:
Oh,
I see!

name: 千雪
text:
うん……初めて映画を観た後は、ずーっと
ヒロインに憧れて真似ばっかりしてたくらい
trans:
After watching the movie for the first time,
I wanted to be like the heroine, so I used to mimicked her all day long.

name: 千雪
text:
その子が身につけてるアクセサリーも可愛くて……
同じようなものを探してつけてたの
trans:
The accessories she wore were so cute…
I looked for something similar, and used to wear it too.

name: 甘奈
text:
そうなんだ
だからかなぁ……？
trans: Is that the reason?

name: 千雪
trans: Huh?

name: 甘奈
text:
あのね、ヒロインの子を見てたら……
なんとなく千雪さんを思い出したの
trans:
Well, when I saw her
I got reminded of you… somehow

name: 甘奈
text:
見た目が似てる、とか
そういうのじゃなくてね
trans: It's not about her appearance, not like that, but she felt similar to you.

name: 千雪
text: わぁ……本当？
trans: Oh… really?

name: 千雪
text:
……ありがとう
そう言ってもらえて、とっても嬉しい
trans:
Thank you for saying so…
It made me feel happy

name: 甘奈
text: あ、でもでも……
trans: Ah… but I'm sure,

name: 甘奈
text:
きっと、今度は千雪さんに憧れる
女の子とかも出て来る番だよねっ
trans: It's your turn. I'm sure girls will look at you, and admire you just like that.

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、そっか……
そう思ってもらえたら、すごく素敵ね
trans:
Fufu, right…
If I get such admiration, that would be wonderful.
